validityText:
The input provided consists of a paragraph of text that contains three sentences: "Flowers bloom.", "The wind blows.", "The rain falls.". According to the input specification, the text must contain at least three sentences to be considered valid. Each sentence in the input ends with a period, which is a typical indicator of a sentence in English. Given that the input indeed contains three distinct sentences, it complies with the input specification.

No violation.
OK
